login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: HR Bot Constructor Platform
login.description: Sign in to your account to manage HR bots
login.registerPrompt: Don't have an account? Register via Telegram:
login.demoDescription: Use one of the test accounts to log in:

feature1.title: Create HR Bots
feature1.description: Easily create and customize Telegram bots for collecting candidate resumes

feature2.title: Manage Candidates
feature2.description: Collect, organize, and manage candidate applications in one place

feature3.title: Process Automation
feature3.description: Automate your hiring process with smart questions and validation

dashboard.title: Welcome!
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your HR bots and analyze results

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.createBotDesc: Set up a new HR bot for collecting resumes

bots.title: HR Bots
bots.subtitle: Manage your HR bots
bots.createFirstBot: Create your first HR bot to get started
bots.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the bot "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

questions.title: Question Setup
questions.subtitle: Create a questionnaire for candidates
questions.noQuestionsDesc: Add the first question to create a questionnaire
questions.validationPlaceholder: e.g., Please send a voice message
questions.validationHelp: This message will be shown if the user sends the wrong content type

createBot.title: Create New Bot
createBot.subtitle: Set up your HR bot for collecting resumes
createBot.step1Desc: Specify basic information about your bot
createBot.step3Desc: Make sure all settings are correct
createBot.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of the bot's purpose
createBot.telegramGroupIdHelp: Group ID where resumes will be sent. Starts with "-"
createBot.welcomeMessagePlaceholder: Welcome! Please answer a few questions...
createBot.mediaDescription: Media will be displayed before the welcome message
createBot.closingMessagePlaceholder: Thank you for your application! We will contact you soon.
createBot.closingMessageHelp: This message will be sent after the candidate answers all questions
createBot.name: Name
createBot.whatsNextDesc: After creating the bot, you can configure questions for candidates. The bot will be created in inactive state, activate it after full setup.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings
profile.securityDesc: Change password to protect your account
